lyric: 作曲 Composer : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)
作词 Lyricist : Ruby Qu
编曲 Arranger : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)
制作人 Producer : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)
In candlelight
As time unwinds
I find myself
lost in- your eyes
In midnight tolls
As darkness folds
I see your tears
when we say goodbye
Watching stars as we
drift on by
A touch, a glance, fly away
translation: 一次触摸，一个眼神，都遥不可及

lyric: Will our paths converge be’neath the sun?
translation: 在太阳下，我们的旅途能否交汇？

lyric: A silent desire, in melody sung
translation: 无声的渴望在旋律中歌唱

lyric: Beyond this stolen night
We share a cherished dream
between- souls whispered
That it ‘seems’..
Will shooting stars align, be’neath the sun?
translation: 在太阳的背后，流星能否兑现

lyric: in whispered hopes where journey’s begun
In dreams we waltz the sky
translation: 梦境里，我们在天空起舞

lyric: You watch me drift on by in your memory
translation: 记忆中，你看我随风而逝

lyric: A whispered song;
A seed of hope, where we belong.
translation: 一个只属于我们的小小的希望

lyric: 人声 Vocal Artist：Chevy
人声录音棚 Vocal Recording Studio：The Hideout Recording Studio/升赫录音棚Soundhub Studio
人声录音师 Vocal Recording Engineer：Nik Hotchkiss/Kevin刘瀚文@Soundhub Studios
乐队 Orchestra：国际首席爱乐乐团 International Master Philharmonic Orchestra
乐器录音棚 Instrumental Recording Studio：金田录音棚 Jintian Recording Studio
乐器录音师 Instrumental Recording Engineer：王小四
混音师 Mixing Engineer：阿烈@Soundhub Studios
母带制作 Mastering Engineer：宫奇Gon (HOYO-MiX)
出品 Produced by：HOYO-MiX
